snippet: A night after beating the Spurs, the Nets offered little resistance to Detroit’s Andre Drummond and Brandon Jennings, falling at the Palace, 111-95.
abstract: NBA Roundup; Detroit Pistons beat Brooklyn Nets, 111-95; other basketball scores noted.
lead_paragraph: A night after beating the Spurs, the Nets offered little resistance to Detroit’s Andre Drummond and Brandon Jennings, falling at the Palace, 111-95.

headline.main: Sluggish Nets Are Routed, Ensuring Losing Record at Break
headline.print_headline: Sluggish Nets Are Routed, Ensuring Losing Record at Break
